name: Plinko Panic! (AcidicDuck)
description:
Barrel through dungeons of enemies by strategically choosing 1 of currently over 150 different pinballs from the shop each turn, hitting pegs to deal damage, gain some extra money and heal yourself when needed.

Plinko Panic is a tough, strategic pachinko roguelike... The current version of the game has you go through 4 enemies before facing a boss. The enemies are certainly tough, and if you're defeated your run is then over, use the synergies you can make with the pinballs to your advantage which changes the way you defeat them.

Plinko Panic! is currently in an early-access state, and is also up on Steam here: http://store.steampowered.com/app/1794400/

Current Features
  • 150 different pinballs to choose from, all of different rarities.
  • 35 different passive items to choose from at the end of each minor fight.
  • 37 completely unique enemies to fight up against, each having their own effects (hover over the enemies to see).
  • Shop with different upgradable levels.
  • An interactive playing board that changes in accordance to how you play.
  • 4 Different areas with 6 different difficulties each.

To join my DISCORD and maybe even help out and give your feedback on the game >>CLICK HERE<<

All assets were created by me or used from libraries I have the license to use.
